entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 6:37AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAIN ON TOP OF FRESH SNOW AND ICE... Heavy rain is expected to follow snow and wintry mix that are currently progressing from south to north over the Panhandle. The transition from to rain will follow that same pattern as warm air behind the front moves in from the south. Rain will become heavy at times on Wednesday and persist through Thursday night.
